CSACTIVEEFFECTS.CannotToggleEmbedded: Cannot toggle an Effect on an Embedded Item
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.CannotDeleteEmbedded: Cannot delete an Effect on an Embedded Item
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.damageTrackAsEffectHint: Reflects the Actor's current damage track state (hale/impaired/debilitated) as a status on the Actor's token
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.adjustValueFromMaxName: Adjust pool value when max changed
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.adjustValueFromMaxHint: When checked, a pool's current value will be modified automatically when the pool's maximum value (the same amount will be added/subtracted to the current pool).
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.sortEffectsName: Sort Status Effects in Token HUD
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.sortEffectsHint: When enabled, status effects will be sorted alphabetically within the Token HUD
CSACTIVEEFFECTS.useImageForMacroHint: When a macro is created by dragging a document to the macro action bar, set the Macro's icon to the image defined for the document (if it has one)
